column4: i've installed a .deb package but couldn't find it on the apps menu..any suggestions where to find it?
if its installed it should be in /usr/bin
how do i get it up and running
in a terminal type '/usr/bingimpshop' or just gimpshop might work
look in /usr/bin for gimp using a filemanager
i installed the .deb package by right clicking on the file and install by GDebi installer
see if you can just edit the gnome menu and find it that way
